trans-unit.source: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the Digital Signature Algorithm (DSA).
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação CNG Cryptography Next Generation () do algoritmo de Assinatura Digital (DSA).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng"></xref> class with a random 2,048-bit key pair.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng"> </xref> classe com um par de chave de 2.048 bits aleatório.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng"></xref> class with a randomly generated key of the specified size.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng"> </xref> classe com uma chave gerada aleatoriamente do tamanho especificado.

trans-unit.source: Valid key sizes range from 512 to 3,072 bits, in increments of 64.
trans-unit.target: Tamanhos de chave válidos variam de 512 bits 3,072, em incrementos de 64.

trans-unit.source: We recommend that a minimum size of 2,048 bits be used for all keys.
trans-unit.target: É recomendável que um tamanho mínimo de 2.048 bits seja usado para todas as chaves.

trans-unit.source: The size of the key to generate in bits.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da chave para gerar em bits.

trans-unit.source: keySize is not valid.
trans-unit.target: keySizenão é válido.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng"></xref> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng"> </xref> classe com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.AlgorithmGroup%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of `key` must be <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithmGroup.Dsa%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.AlgorithmGroup%2A?displayProperty=fullName>de `key` devem ser <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithmGroup.Dsa%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithmGroup.Dsa%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.AlgorithmGroup%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a copy of the key.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria uma cópia da chave.

trans-unit.source: Even if `key` is disposed, the copy of this key object in DSA remains alive.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo se `key` é descartado, a cópia deste objeto chave DSA permanece ativa.

trans-unit.source: The key to use for DSA operations.
trans-unit.target: A chave a ser usado para operações de DSA.

trans-unit.source: key is not a valid DSA key.
trans-unit.target: keynão é uma chave DSA válida.

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: keyis .

trans-unit.source: Creates the digital signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Cria a assinatura digital de dados especificado.

trans-unit.source: The data to be signed.
trans-unit.target: Os dados a ser assinado.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura digital de dados especificado.

trans-unit.source: rgbHash is .
trans-unit.target: rgbHashis .

trans-unit.source: rgbHash is shorter in length than the Q value of the DSA key .
trans-unit.target: rgbHashé mais curta que o valor Q da chave DSA.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Exports the DSA algorithm parameters.
trans-unit.target: Exporta os parâmetros de algoritmo DSA.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include private parameters; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para incluir parâmetros privados. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DSA algorithm parameters.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros de algoritmo DSA.

trans-unit.source: DSA key is not a valid public or private key.
trans-unit.target: Chave DSA não é uma chave pública ou privada válida.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the existing key that the current instance is working with by creating a new <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref> for the parameters structure.
trans-unit.target: Substitui a chave existente que trabalha com a instância atual, criando um novo <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"> </xref> para a estrutura de parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: The DSA parameters.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros DSA.

trans-unit.source: The specified DSA parameters are not valid.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros DSA especificados não são válidos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that will be used by the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng"></xref> object for any cryptographic operation that it performs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave que será usada pelo <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng"> </xref> objeto para qualquer operação criptográfica que ele executa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object is disposed if the key is reset, for instance by changing the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.KeySize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng.ImportParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create a new key, or by disposing the parent <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>o objeto é descartado se a chave for redefinida, por exemplo, alterando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.KeySize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade usando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng.ImportParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para criar uma nova chave, ou removendo o pai <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng.ImportParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.KeySize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should ensure that the key object is no longer used in these cases.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, você deve garantir que o objeto de chave não é usado nesses casos.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object is not the same as the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object passed to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng.%23ctor%2A> constructor, if that constructor was used.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>objeto não é igual a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>objeto passado para o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng.%23ctor%2A>construtor, se esse construtor foi usado.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: However, it will point to the same CNG key.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, ele vai apontar para a mesma chave CNG.

trans-unit.source: The key used by the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng"></xref> object to perform cryptographic operations.
trans-unit.target: A chave usada pelo <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACng"> </xref> objeto para executar operações criptográficas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the key exchange algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do algoritmo de troca de chaves.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key sizes, in bits, that are supported by the DSA algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os tamanhos de chave em bits, que são suportados pelo algoritmo DSA.

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the key sizes supported by the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz que contém os tamanhos de chave suportados pelo algoritmo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the signature algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do algoritmo de assinatura.

trans-unit.source: The string "DSA".
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres "DSA".

trans-unit.source: Verifies if the specified digital signature matches the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se a assinatura digital especificada corresponde os dados especificados.

trans-unit.source: The signed data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados assinados.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature to be verified.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura digital a ser verificado.

trans-unit.source: if rgbSignature matches the signature computed using the specified data; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se rgbSignature corresponde à assinatura calculada usando os dados especificados; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: The rgbHash parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The rgbHash parameter is .

trans-unit.source: -or- The rgbSignature parameter is .
trans-unit.target: -or- The rgbSignature parameter is .

trans-unit.source: rgbHash is shorter in length than the Q value of the DSA key .
trans-unit.target: rgbHashé mais curta que o valor Q da chave DSA.
